fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.manager

Interface KnownDevice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Attributable, Device, Identifiable

    public interface KnownDevice
extends Device
    Represents a device which is known by the device manager.
    Author:
    Thomas Leveque

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.manager.Device

        LIFECYCLE_METADATA

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ApplicationDevice getApplicationDevice(Application app)
      Returns device proxy representing this device which is visible from specified application.
      List<ApplicationDevice> getApplicationDevices()
      Returns all devices representing this device which are visible from applications.
      Application getAppOwner()
      Returns the application which has exported this device if it exists.
      AvailableDevice getAvailableDevice()
      Returns the available device if it exists.

    • Method Detail

      • getAvailableDevice

        AvailableDevice getAvailableDevice()
        Returns the available device if it exists. Else returns null.
        Returns:
        the available device if it exists.

      • getApplicationDevices

        List<ApplicationDevice> getApplicationDevices()
        Returns all devices representing this device which are visible from applications. Returns an empty list if there is no one.
        Returns:
        all devices representing this device which are visible from applications.

      • getApplicationDevice

        ApplicationDevice getApplicationDevice(Application app)
        Returns device proxy representing this device which is visible from specified application. Returns null if does not exist.
        Returns:
        device proxy representing this device which is visible from specified application.

      • getAppOwner

        Application getAppOwner()
        Returns the application which has exported this device if it exists. Else returns null.
        Returns:
        the application which has exported this device if it exists.
